title: Lost access to Trash folder in Thunderbird
content: I have Thunderbird set up to download email from my ISP to an inbox under that account. A few days ago I saw that when I deleted a message it did not go the the Trash folder. When I look at the properties of that folder it shows a blank for location and while the message is deleted from the inbox it disappears. I do not know how that location was lost or how to restore it to it's previous value.
creator: 9v04dxj7

title: Add my Gmail Calendar to Thunderbird desktop
content: Cómo puedo tener mi Calendario de mis cuentas Gmail sincronizado en ThunderBird
creator: jjpp070588

title: Email has disappeared
content:
Hi all,

I received an email from my outlook.com.au address yesterday with an important image attachement. However, I did not notice the yellow bar with option to enable remote content.

This particular email was replied to by other recipients and therefore it was threaded.

Somehow I have lost most of the thread after trying to see where the attachments were.

The email is still there on other clients as well as the MS web interface. I can see the full thread in another tab in conversation view.

If I do a search for it in my inbox via the search function, it is there.

How do I view this email back in my inbox?

Regards,

Steve
creator: OzSteveC

title: Some of my messages in gmail are showing up as Apple Mail codes instead of messages.  I am running Thunderbird 128.1 esr on Linux Mint's latest release, with the Cinnamon desktop.
content: Let me know what is going on. The email body looks like this: --Apple-Mail=_1D9EAF11-013B-453A-AADB-AC37461D7BF3--

title: Suddenly folders are only showing unread messages
content: I was moving messages to folders from inbox and suddenly Thunderbird was only listing unread messages in all folders. I must have accidentally turned something off. Can you help me? This is rather urgent.
creator: martypa

title: Cannot open emails after Windows Onedrive Sync.
content:
I accidentally activated the OneDrive sync. After the mail directory were uploaded to the OneDrive cloud, thunderbird mail can only see each new mail title, but I cannot open these mails after I double click into them. It will just come back as directory and file not found. In other words, the paths are valid, but I can only see title without the preview nor the content of the emails.

File not found The file mailbox:///C:/Users/XXXXXX/MozillaMail/xxxxxx/Inbox?number=2704 cannot be found. Please check the location and try again.

Any help is welcome and appreciated, thank you in advance.
creator: e34

title: Changing method of authentication
content: How do I change the "authentication method" in Thunderbird for an e-mail account to oauth?
creator: catlover4ever100

title: Problema con messaggi non letti quando eliminati e non letti
content:
Thunderbird è impostato per considerare un messaggio letto se passano 10 secondi di lettura.

A volte un'email viene eliminata da me prima di tale tempistica ed in questo caso Thunderbird continua a segnalarmi messaggi non letti anche se nell'inbox non ci sono messaggi da leggere.

C'è modo di evitare questo comportamento senza rinunciare all'impostazione di considerare un messaggio come letto dopo 10 secondi?

Con altri client email non ho questo problema, solo Thunderbird mi dà questo problema di segnare che ci sono nuovi messaggi non letti anche per i messaggi cestinati.

Grazie
creator: peopleinside

title: spammap legen
content: Mijn spam map bevat ± 150 berichten. Ik begrijp dat het een zelflerende vermogen is. Kan ik de map legen of worden dan eerdere spamberichten niet meer herkend? Vriendelijke groet, Henk van Driel
creator: vandriel.sport

title: Thunderbird issue with unread deleted messages
content:
Thunderbird is set to flag a message as unread only after 10 sec of reading. Sometimes I delete a message before this time and Thunderbird still notify me that there are unread message also if the inbox has not unread message. The issue will persist if I don't restart Thunderbird or if I don't find that deleted message and set it to read.

Only Thunderbird gives this issue, other email client don't notify me about unread message if i delete a message but still be flagged as unread.

Any solution to have unread notification only for inbox? Thanks.
creator: peopleinside

title: when I try to send email as ivanwarner247@outlook.com I get message that IVANWARNER247@OUTLOOK.COM can't email as ivanwarner247@outllook.com
content: I have no trouble to log in to outlook.com but thunderbird says its the wrong password, Ihave changed it 3 times and it still says wrong password, I like thunderbird but don't understsnd what is wrong at the moment.

title: Html code mailto is not working anymore in received html messages
content:
blabla

To reply please press here


When i open uppercode in browser Firefox and push the hyperlink, Thunderbird start correctly a new message with content (subject and body). When i receive uppercode as message in Thunderbird and push the hyperlink, Thunderbird open an empty window (and from now all messages are empty). After restart Thunderbird all messages are visible again. Is it a bug?

I am running Thunderbird Desktop Version 128.1.1esr | Released August 21, 2024 with Windows 11 Home 23H2
